org.crosswire.common.swing
类 NumericDocument

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument
      javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
          org.crosswire.common.swing.NumericDocument
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.text.Document
public class NumericDocument
extends javax.swing.text.PlainDocument

A numeric document simply extends document to refuse all non-numeric data entered according to Character.isDigit.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., Character.isDigit(char), 序列化表格
